headline: Chevron and Woodside strike LNG asset swap deal in Western Australia
summary: The asset swap includes Woodside's 13% non-operated stake in the Wheatstone project and 65% operated stake in the Julimar-Brunello project.

headline: Woodside, Chevron Agree to Asset Swap
summary: Chevron and Woodside Energy agreed to an asset swap that they said will sharpen their focus on the massive LNG operations they each operate in Western Australia.
